entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Norfolk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.1°C

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Snow squalls near Lake Erie. Blowing snow. Amount 15 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 12:27 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow squalls near Lake Erie early this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 12:27 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
